menuItemRecipes.name: Cheese burger
menuItemRecipes.prepInstruction:
Toast bun.
Melt cheese on top of patty.
Put mustard, ketchup, onions & patty with cheese on bottom bun.
Put mayo & lettuce on top bun.
Cut in half.

menuItemRecipes.name: Fries
menuItemRecipes.prepInstruction:
Slice potatoes.
Fry once at lower temp, rest, then fry again at higher temp.
Salt and plate.
